title: Monday Post Show (9-13-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (9-13-21)
description:
Bobby starts talking about his “Vagina Bone” hurting after a weekend of mountain biking. He also saw Ben Rector out a dinner and said hello to him not knowing if he recognized him or not. Bobby also talks about something flagging him down to take a picture in the bathroom. Bobby on what today is the best day to book your flights for the holidays. Raymundo also wants to get on Celebrity Big Brother. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
